thread.title: Very disappointed... will never go there again
thread.title_full: Very disappointed... will never go there again - Review of Hotel Holiday Inn Paris Gare Montparnasse, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Michel G
title: Very disappointed... will never go there again
text:
Stayed there for 1 night this week, on a business trip to PAris. I must say that I was very disappointed... I hardly slept, due to the internal (a permanent rumbling, coming fro heater or AC...) and external (facing the street) noise... I thought my bed was stuck in traffic. Additionally, breakfast is definitively not a the level of the expectations for such a place and price - no hot dishes, for instance... The only positive side was staff who were all very nice and helpful. I was already at that place, few years ago, it's definitively gotten worse ! I surely wonn't go back.
Room Tip: Avoid the street side, soundproofing is terrible. See more room tips
